## PDB statistics 
import our PDB statistics CSV file and calculate percent structures by experimental method. 

```{r}
p <- read.csv("Data Export Summary.csv", row.names=1)
```

```{r}
percent <- (p$Total / sum(p$Total))*100
names(percent) <- row.names(p)
percent
```
